title: Morgana needs a new model and particle effects.
body: No problem, Riot. Fix her up, yeah? And Shaco needs a skin.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=ForwardSkies,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=EORRtf61,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-05T09:09:40.769+0000)
>
> Seen Nunu?

Nunu hasn't gotten a skin that looks like it was designed by a three-year-old with crayons.
I bet the same three-year-old drew some of swains skins too. Yuck.
Yeah, I agree after seeing her new "1350" skin, I reckon they both need tweaking.
